title.text: Develop your ideas without extra costs

items.title: Enjoy a grant to try out the platform
items.text: You'll get a grant to try out the platform for at least RUB 4000 when creating a billing account. You can spend this amount for Yandex Cloud services within the next two months.

items.title: Affordable rates and free tier
items.text: You can rent a VM for as low as 116 rubles per month and use a managed database cluster starting at 530 rubles per month. You can host a small website, app, or service for free using the free tier of the serverless computing ecosystem.

items.title: Transparent pricing and discounts
items.text: In Yandex Cloud, you always know how much you'll spend and how your budget will be used. Commit to a certain volume of resources for 1 or 3 years in advance and save up to 49%. If you know your expected performance needs, contact the sales department.
